bio.title: About Alex
bio.imageAlt: Photo of Alex Rivera in a creative workspace
paragraphs: I'm a UX/UI Designer and Creative Director passionate about creating meaningful digital experiences. With 6 years in the industry, I've helped startups and established brands craft user-centered designs that drive engagement and deliver results.

My approach combines empathy with dataâ€”understanding user needs through research, then translating insights into beautiful, functional interfaces. I believe great design is invisible: it just works.

I specialize in end-to-end product design, from user research and wireframing to high-fidelity prototypes and design systems. My work has helped increase user engagement by up to 40% and conversion rates by 25%.
When I'm not designing, you'll find me exploring Brooklyn's art scene, experimenting with photography, or mentoring junior designers through Design Buddies.
